intro: Game/app with collectionable fictional creatures that can be pets or used in fights.

post.body:
Bulball, the first Tamigucho.
Created in the year of 2011 by @Plasmmer:
Tags: #bulball #tamigucho

Onionut, metamorphose of Bulball.
Created in the year of 2013 by @Plasmmer:
Tags: #bulball #onionut #tamigucho

Ballbull, direct metamorphose from Onionut and final metamorphose of Bulball.
Created in the year of 2013 by @Plasmmer:
Tags: #bulball #onionut #ballbull #tamigucho
